title: Impulse - change in momentum from F-t graph

content.question: What is the approximate change in the momentum of the cart during the time interval shown?

choices.label: <math alttext="2.0 kilogram meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mn>2.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>kg</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">·</mo><mtext>m/s</mtext></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
